samples.question: [Transcript chunk 3]
samples.transcript: You ask most people who know me what the talent Conor has probably speaking public speaking or an ability to communicate ideas with some degree of precision do you think this Talent can be useful for your future work well absolutely I I do not think it is limited to work I would say most people are drawn to other people who are able to communicate I mean there is a reason why we like storytellers there is a reason why as a society we we pay comedians to talk or we go to public lectures because we like listening to people who can communicate ideas effectively and precisely and do you think people in your family have this same Talent yes I should say I mean I am lucky in that several of my uncles and my aunt well particularly several of my uncles on my mother's side are very very very well educated far more educated than I am but if one of them has two phds and in totally different fields of science and they are all able to expand at length on any really significant topic that you throw at them well what do you think about X and they will be able to have a discussion an intelligent discussion at length with with complete ease and it is actually rather impressive yes right now Connor I am going to give you a topic and I would like you to talk about it for one to two minutes.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 2]
samples.transcript: Also like the special dishes that are being made during in them like that are being sold in the street vendors in Bangladesh for example one of my favorite winter dishes is pizza so what do you do in winter when the weather is very cold so when the weather is very cold I tend to stay indoors so that I will not fall sick but if ever I do need to go out then usually maybe my family we would visit other relatives house and just enjoy their company do you like traveling during winter yes I do like traveling during winter because during the winter month we do a long extended me I found me and my family we would try with travelage which is also here in Bangladesh and it is really nice because I am able to again catch up with my cousins and family members who live in the village and also try their winter dishes did you enjoy winter holidays when you were at school yes I did enjoy winter holidays in Bangladesh whenever winter does arrive we do get a long break which is I think one month in duration and we either go abroad or travel locally in Bangladesh one of my fondest memory as a child was actually traveling to Cox's Bazaar and being able to enjoy the winter there there by trying out new dishes or traveling locally there for example we went to sunderban and Saint Martin.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 3]
samples.transcript: Do you understand your prepression time is over now remember you have one or two minutes for this so do not worry if I stop you would you like to start now yes please okay so a new technological device that I will be talking about is actually the PCR machine that was utilized during the covid-19 pandemic so as part of my undergraduate curriculum we actually got the opportunity to utilize this machine because it is actually available in my laboratory so this actually happened just a couple of months ago during my fourth year so the PCR machine itself is called the polymerase Chain Reaction machine and it is utilized to detect whether a sample contains a positive or A negative covet detection and basically it is actually a fairly easy to use you just need a sample and our covet sample was inactive meaning that even though it is going to be positive if you detect it it would not infect other people so we were safe when we used the sample and all you have to do is mix it with other reagents and put it in the machine itself the machine is fairly simple to use you only need to incubate it and amplify the sample for only 30 minutes and the Machine can also handle more than 100 sample at a time so what is unfortunate is understanding that how the government was making a business out of these testing because as we all know covet tests are very expensive however the time and effort that it needs to even test is sample is actually very short and very simple and if you know if you had the means to contact the government then we would actually suggest to lower the prices of these covet testing.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 4]
samples.transcript: Centers and so that it is more easier for the general public to be able to utilize them okay thank you thank you very much which latest technology items would many young people like to buy I think it depends on their gender for example younger males they tend to gravitate towards things that are more I guess that are more more in trend for example maybe the latest smart watches or the latest gadget like cell phones also they tend to gravitate towards like gaming devices so gaming consoles like the latest PS5 or the latest Xbox however for girls I would say that they are they tend to focus more on the beauty aspect so I guess they would spend money on maybe the newer model of hair dryer or hair straightener how do the expensive items that younger people want to buy differ from those that older people want to buy here in Bangladesh the older generation they tend to be a lot more conscious in what they are spending their money with and also since they have worked for a long period of time they also have a higher Revenue of their funds so for example in Bangladesh the older generation they might spend their money on buying different properties or houses or even cars so that their own children may be able to inherit it one day however the younger generation they tend to be a lot more influenced by what is happening during the media and so they gravitate towards buying things that again are like digital watches or maybe cell phones so that is able to show off maybe to their peers to gain more attention how difficult is it to become rich in this world we all know we are going through economic crisis not.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 5]
samples.transcript: Only is writing the rest of the world through maybe like an economic recession so I think right now currently it is a bit hard to become rich however at the end of the day if you do have the connections and you are making wise decisions in understanding where your money is going and you have the determination effort that I think you can become rich but maybe not right now but maybe further down the line do you agree that money does not bring happiness yes I do agree that money does not bring happiness but I do believe that it does bring opportunities and also gives you a peace of mind if you do have the extra income then you do not have to like worry about the day-to-day struggles of where you know where you can earn money instead you can use that money to I spending on things that you enjoy and again these can create temporary happiness in your opinion what are the ways might rich people use their money to help the society rich people have a sense of should have a sense of responsibility of where their money is going and if you do have the extra income that I think is responsibility to be able to donate to maybe different charities or organizations that will be able to utilize your money in a greater effort because at the end of the day I do not think everyone has the the time or the means to be able to like go door to door to like spend their money but if you are able to donate to a particular organization then they could do the work for you thank you that is the end of the speaking test.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 2]
samples.transcript: Better and some questions on a general topic do you work or study I do both currently I am teaching I have been teaching for the past five years I also study I studied Westminster I have recently finished my bachelor's and now I am doing my masters at the same University yeah aspect of your job do you like the most well one of the things I really enjoy is being able to do what I love and also at the same time make money off of it well I absolutely love it yeah I love just meeting my students every day helping them get good scores and it is so great I love it I enjoy it yeah what changes do you want to see in your work I would like my Academy where I work I want them to bring back is that when I just got into work about like three years ago into this Academy they would give teachers free seats but there was like one condition you had to get an eight or above but now they no longer have it if I am not mistaken you still can take it but you have to sign like contract yeah so you can take IELTS for free but you either pay for it yourself or you will have to sign a contract which I honestly I do not really like it yeah I would love it to change.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 7]
samples.transcript: Have driverless cars well absolutely as you said I think it will drastically reduce as long as it is all statistically that there is proof that they are safe then yeah absolutely I would love to see more of them on the roads because especially here in Uzbekistan the problem with drivers that most of them are very Reckless and we will let the drivers here in Uzbekistan they tend to drive too fast change the lanes too often and they never use turning signals and that is a problem we have thousands of people dying on the roads and you do not want that and you want to save as many lives as possible and have driverless cars they happen to be one of the ways to reduce the number of casualties we have because of Road collisions I would be more than happy to accept that yeah absolutely would it not be amazing to have flying cars you know I have recently watched an interview with this very popular physicist and scientists I think his name is Nell degress Tyson he was talking about this concept of having flying cars and he said that we already have them we actually already have flying cars since it is helicopters but the problem with flying cars is that the amount of thrust and power they will have to generate it must be equal to the weight of the car itself so the problem is like we are going to have them even if we have them the first ones will be very loud very noisy another problem is like they might not be as energy efficient so there are problems we need to consider first before trying to create them and yeah we already have them is helicopters and you know I think everybody.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 4]
samples.transcript: Too much time indoors these days yeah these days since the Technologies has developed a lot there are lots of computer games lots of phone games unfortunately children tend to spend time lots of spend lots of time at home okay do you think exercise is important definitely exercise is important even I can notice notice about myself if I do not do any physical activity for a long time my body aches a lot and yeah it is necessary since you are a baby what sports are popular in your country like a big sports or just for leisure activity you can choose a big sport yeah in my country I think the most popular sport is football yeah lots of my friends especially male friends and my father they really enjoy watching football yeah and support some teams okay and what kinds of exercises do you enjoy I do not go to gyms usually I just exercise at home sometimes I can joke is running along the river or do just some pushups or something like that at home by myself okay and are there any leisure activities that you want to try in the future I have as I already mentioned I have never tried skiing I have never tried snowboarding even though it could be a little bit dangerous if you cannot do that well but I still want to try if you do not give it a try then you will never know how it is okay that is the end of your a speaking test thank you very much for your time and I hope you have a good day thank you okay I am going to ask you some post test question questions just to get an idea of how.
